title: Shreenathji ERP+CRM Frontend Test Plan
description: Comprehensive frontend testing for Shreenathji ERP+CRM System including authentication, lead management, document management, and deal pipeline

steps.name: Login with valid credentials
steps.description: User should be able to log in with valid email and password
steps: Enter valid email in email field
Enter valid password in password field
steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard

steps.name: Login with invalid credentials
steps.description: User should see error message for invalid credentials
steps.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid credentials' is shown and user remains on login page

steps.name: Password visibility toggle
steps.description: User should be able to toggle password visibility
steps: Verify password is hidden by default
steps.expected_result: Password visibility toggles correctly between visible and hidden

steps.name: Create new lead
steps.description: User should be able to create a new lead
steps: Fill in lead form with required fields (name, email, etc.)
Verify lead appears in leads list
steps.expected_result: New lead is created successfully and visible in leads list

steps.name: View leads list
steps.description: User should be able to view all leads with product names
steps: Verify product names are shown (not IDs or raw data)
Verify pagination works if many leads exist
steps.expected_result: Leads list displays correctly with product names visible

steps.name: Upload document
steps.description: User should be able to upload a document with proper validation
steps: Select document type (COA, TDS, MSDS, or Contract)
Select product or customer based on document type
Choose file (PDF, JPG, JPEG, or PNG)
Verify document appears in documents list
Verify document type and linked entity are correct
steps.expected_result: Document is uploaded successfully with progress indication and appears in documents list

steps.name: View document preview
steps.description: User should be able to preview documents without downloading
steps: Click eye icon on a document
Verify document opens in preview modal or new tab
steps.expected_result: Document preview opens correctly showing document content

steps.name: View deals pipeline
steps.description: User should see deals organized in Kanban board
steps: Verify deals are organized by stage (columns)
Verify drag and drop functionality if available
steps.expected_result: Deals pipeline displays correctly in Kanban format

steps.name: Edit deal
steps.description: User should be able to edit a deal
steps: Click Edit option from dropdown menu
Modify deal details in the form
Verify changes are reflected in the deal card
steps.expected_result: Deal is updated successfully and changes are visible

steps.name: Navigate to dashboard
steps.description: First navigation link should route to dashboard for authenticated users
steps: Click first navigation link in sidebar
Verify user is not logged out
steps.expected_result: User is redirected to dashboard, not logged out, and dashboard loads correctly
